website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for men who love the looks of Sperry and sneakers, as this pair combines the best of both for a price that's a bit lower than most shoes by the brand.
pros: Textile and canvass construction offers breathable comfort
cons: May fit tightly on wide feet
Not the best choice for dressy events

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes. Color is vibrant and stands out well. I have received many compliments on them. I live in South Florida, so wearing boat shoes is a very common practice year round. Don't expect alot of support, like a modern running sneaker. The fit and comfort level is very similar to a canvas Chuck Taylor sneaker, if you can relate to my reference. Very good shoes for walking and casual wear. Met my expectations as I expect a good casual wear shoe abd not a performance sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit with Support & A Stylish Versatile Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a perfect fit for my husband who is a standard size 11.5. They also give great support with a very comfortable sole. My husband has a tendency to walk on the insides of his feet, has had 7 knee surgeries, and has virtually no arch. Finding shoes for him is quite a task. Not only are these shoes stylish, but they also provide great support and limit impact (especially considering this is a dress/casual shoe). Nice craftsmanship. Color is true to the photo. A perfect addition to any man’s wardrobe as you can dress them up or down. Overall, great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Pack

customer_reviews.title: Yappy dogs are yappy dogs
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really solve the problem with the miniature poodles in the office. Fun to discuss how this might with the other workers who can actually raise socialized dogs. But quite useless in practice with those that don't. Similar problem with social economic ideals, I guess. The selfish ruin it for everyone. Just buy a heavy shovel. Get to use it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Phlogiston Theory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I've been wearing them at least 3x per week since August 2019 and they a still in great condition. The design is excellent IMO. They seem to last long. Plus, they are super comfortable. My only issue is that they squeak a lot while I am walking. I'm not sure if it's the socks I wear, but I cannot seem to fix the squeak.
customer_reviews.author: SouloTaughtMe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: Set up on common property line. Neighbor's english bulldog barks at everything and nothing at all. It seemed to work the first day or two she'd hear bark, then pause, then bark. The next week she barked less. Now it seems like she's not responding. She is also set off by us being outside or someone walking down the street. If a dog has anxiety or is an alert dog this device will not stop them from barking when they are triggered.
customer_reviews.author: TPP

customer_reviews.title: “Wide” is not wide enough.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a 9.5 Wide. They are not as wide as one would expect. In fact, they are no wider than the regular ones of the same brand and type my Dad is replacing. And they were worn in, from years of use. Couldn’t get him a 10 as they would be too long.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Needs some work to feel right
customer_reviews.text: These shoes did not live up to expectations of cushioning, especially in the heel. When I first put them on I felt like my weight was going back into the heel - that was a no-go. To avoid sending them back since I was leaving on a trip I added some half length gels for the heel to straighten up the stance and then another interior pad the length of the shoe. Once I did all of that they are great shoes but for a company that prides itself on comfort I felt like they should have come this way.
customer_reviews.author: cayossarian

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style all in one, what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are lightweight, comfortable and at a reasonable cost. I first discovered Sperry shoes back in 2010. Once I had bought one, I almost immediately bought another pair. When I bought these, I was looking for some lightweight tennis shoes. But, seeing Sperry again, I immediately ditched the tennis shoe idea and bought these. Fit great and feel wonderful. Good job, guys!
customer_reviews.author: James S. Sobek

customer_reviews.title: Great boat shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried off brand boat shoes, but always go back to Sperry's. They are my summer shoes and have been for almost 30 years. These fit great. A little better on the all day factor than my pure leather ones. Size seems to stay the same. They do run slightly larger than say a pair of Steve Maddens. I wear a NB running shoes in the same size as my Sperry's. Maybe that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch711

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! You can dress them up or down and he said they're super comfortable. He generally wears a size 13 but he needed a size 12 in this particular style.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Wide size is not so wide
customer_reviews.text: Have had these shoes in a Wide width before and they fit fine. This time they are only 1/4" wider than a standard width and less comfortable. Shame on you Sperry for scrimping on the raw materials so that you can get more shoes out of a roll. You have tarnished your image.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased overall. Looks and fits nicely. Very comfortable, almost like a soft sneaker. Break in was minimal. Fit is probably just a touch to the smaller side. If you’re in-between sizes I’d suggest the larger, by a half size. I typically wear a 10 1/2 or 11. I chose the 11 and the fit is very nice. That’s with no socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike7000

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe style
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband. He loves them. they fit as expected and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Beaupre

customer_reviews.title: Like em but?
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking .. I have a problem with sizing. Also I can't figure out how Sperry pictures show the lace so neatly and I can't repeat that look? Pretty happy but due to the wide size was only ones available I have to tighten the ties and that causes my slip on purpose problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Now i do suggest order either half to 1 full size smaller they run very long , Im normally a 11 and had to return for 10 and they fit perfect , recommend no show socks or your feet will be blue for a couple of days , Blue is the color of the in lays
customer_reviews.author: Perez Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great on boat.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Very comfortable. I use them on boats and can say they have great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Merling

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an all white dinner in Jamaica before a wedding. I had broke a toenail and took some flesh with it. this was the only closed toe shoe I could wear without pain. ended up wearing for the wedding also.
customer_reviews.author: J R W

customer_reviews.title: These run big  beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice, if your looking for something that fits well and look nice these are it, just i would recommend looking for a size lower than your normal, i wear a size 15 and i ordered a size 15 Wide, it fits perfectly around the sides but i have about an extra inch of room in the front of the shoe, other than that i have no issues with this product at the time and would recommend them :D
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Diaz

customer_reviews.title: They run a little small on the width,
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes they are very comfortable and they look good, it took a while to get the right color but after two returns I got the right ones, thank you so much.!
customer_reviews.author: J pizzo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable. Ideal for daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a tad bit larger than expected. They are canvas shoes so expect them to stretch a little bit. Otherwise comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: True to size, but rubs heels
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size, but caused me to bleed from the heels after a couple days wearing around the house from the rope/string embedded in the heel. I added some heel cups to raise my foot up a bit, which was an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Abh

customer_reviews.title: these fit ok, not for walking long distances
customer_reviews.text: female review- these shoes complete the outfit. however my bf does not find them as comfortable as the baby blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W & Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfy. Heavier shoe that needs to be broken in.
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying Sperry’s and they did not disappoint. The shoes are heavier than other sneaker-type shoes, but have a thicker sole and more cushioning around the heel area. Tow box is a little large, but i have slightly narrow feet. One complaint would be the seem at the heel of the shoe. It was designed so the seem is right at the ankle and can rub and irritate the skin at first if worn without socks. This can be avoided by breaking in the shoe before wearing for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size down
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these every day to work in the summer. We just know with this brand to order a half size smaller than his usual size. They're great shoes and last forever though.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKE!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the gray ones for my husband. They are fake! They do not match the picture. The sole was white, the laces tan, eyelets in the picture are the right sperry logo eyelets. These have g era blades and plane cheap looking eyelets. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: mmh15

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sperry's is a well-known brand. These shoes hold up well, get the job done on the beach, and also are stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Leopold the Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Already holes in the product! I gave them tony son for Christmas! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't shoes, I bought a bark box, and it was garbage. My dog just looked at me weird when the high pitch noise emits
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boat shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair years ago and Sperry has not changed. Top quality comfort. Wore all day first day.
customer_reviews.author: Pussywillow1

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, made by Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and described. Nice to be able to buy a name-brand without sizing issues!
customer_reviews.author: MartyG

customer_reviews.title: Heel causes blisters!!!
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe (heel) caused terrible blisters. I’ve worn them a few times and these are by far the worst pair of Sperry’s I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chew

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. 4 dogs, none of them were affected. Not in a tiny room and not outside. Could be a box with a light for all I know.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Aaaah the silence
customer_reviews.text: Neighbors had six barking dogs in a pen. They would bark 24x7, 365 days a year. Now they have 6 quiet dogs in a pen.
customer_reviews.author: Austin  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could wear them for a wedding and then returned them. They did the job. Just not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend makeover
customer_reviews.text: If you want him to wear something that won't embarrass you, buy these. They look great. I'm sure my ex enjoys them, wherever he is now!
customer_reviews.author: JTrain

customer_reviews.title: Finally found therm in a wide size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Had them years ago and there great. Finally found them here in a wide size.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I like my shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are comfortable, and reasonably priced. I take a WIDE, and this one was PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Backus

customer_reviews.title: hubby loves them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice looking, very comfortable. Dress up or down!
customer_reviews.author: Hygienist45

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are clearly not new. I would like a refund. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Lukomski

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for Christmas and a month later coming apart. Would like an exchange for same product and size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I personally don’t like that it’s off white but they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Inouye

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: A little tight due to the elastic on the tongue. Good no-slip soles.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Borcherding

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boat shoe ever.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable feel ever in a boat shoe. Could wear them forever and then just throw them in washing machine if they start to get a little ripe. Love the black fabric choice.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit but they are made wrong. The leather upper is sewed on crooked
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: A NIce Shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are okay but not quite as stylish as I expected. The toe is a bit too rounded for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of Sperry shoe! I am replacing a pair that I have had for 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: D Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I have a chihuahua/ jack russell
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this helps, but my dog still barks. His breed doesn’t help much, but it’s better than nothing. When he starts barking, I feel the tick in my ears. This gadget makes some sort of “noise” that they hate, so they can stop barking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband as a Christmas present. He loves them and he’s picky.
customer_reviews.author: KKing

customer_reviews.title: Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Size was right on the money. I do suggest getting no show socks or you’ll rip open skin like me with this nice white sperrys. Easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs about a half size larger than my size.  Nice quality and color.
customer_reviews.text: Smart casual and sporty. Looks great with everyday wear. Nice color!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting any cushion in this shoe then you should look elsewhere. I’m not saying that as a negative, but rather informative. I knew that going in. Great shoe. Great for casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was poorly made and had excess material, poorly sewn and consequently irritated my foot to the point of causing a blister.
customer_reviews.author: David Pepin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I got a great price on these. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, so good looking and great to wear
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Looks and wears good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, which is to be expected with Sperry products.
customer_reviews.author: A.Keith White

customer_reviews.title: They look good
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had a little bit heel inside, not to be so flat, So not very comfortable but looks good..
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear several pair, and they are very comfortable, good for all but formal occasions and well priced
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: great deal for easy to wash boat shoes
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to find my size in store. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: And I absolutely love them I love the color I love the shape ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Sperry shoes. And I absolutely love them I love the color I love the shape and I love the way they're made they fit well and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wear these for work and for around the town. Very stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Brock S

customer_reviews.title: Good design but already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Love this the design and color but sperrys never last long. Worn them twice and the inside is already falling apart. Extremely disappointed. I like the new sole though. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with gel inserts; very durable and stylish, too!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and really comfortable! As long as you put gel inserts in them. I wore through my last pair until they ripped on the back heel. Seeing as they do not provide much arch support, I tried the gel insert and have loved them. Very flexible with multiple outfits and styles!
customer_reviews.author: Colton Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A great little boat shoe for the price. Fits well, feels good on my feet. It’s my favorite shoe for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: James Lumm

customer_reviews.title: Rough finish inside shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Size is right but finishes on inside are rough. Shoe really cut into back of foot and just above big toe knuckle. Had to place band aides all over my foot if I wore with no socks.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Siverio

customer_reviews.title: Yeeep they fit nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, you should probably treat your feat and pick them up. Take care then, buhbye now.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: The men's size 8 is more like an 8.5 so order a 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I’ve worn for about a year. Still holding up easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great style, Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love em ! width is perfect size is perfect. Look is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J. López

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but fit large.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great and comfortable. I gave 4 stars because of the fit. We had to return the first pair for a smaller size. Almost for 2 sizes too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schoonmaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but
customer_reviews.text: Two issues. Leather laces don't stay tied and poor glue adhesion of the sole makes them sound like a bubble popping when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: william mill

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 12. Had to exchange for an 11. 11 fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Mihailoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and good fit. The shoe strings do manage to come untied, but other than that they are nice boat shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Txmmoore

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not like these shoes very much. He wasn't impressed with the quality of the shoe overall.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Eckman

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He ordered an entire size smaller than he normally wears and those seem to work for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Faust

customer_reviews.title: A very nice shoe for him.
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing bad about receiving this product great shipping and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: dianejanetd

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were advertised as true to fit. They were not which led to too many returns and reorders. The shoes are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Track Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous because I read reviews and everyone said they ran big so I bought a size down for my husband. They fit perfect! Size down for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are my go to's. Love the color, goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Painful because they tear up the back of my heel
customer_reviews.author: Ken Woeller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves these! Walked a long way the first time he wore them...no problems!
customer_reviews.author: dlaw

customer_reviews.title: Howdy Captain.  Nice comfortable kicks  Buy 'em.
customer_reviews.text: Sperry sole. Low achilles back (nice). white as a sheet. COMFORTABLE. Nice price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of these in 2019
customer_reviews.text: My second pair and love em ! Whereas shoes hardly ever get compliments , I’ve had more than ever with these ! Colors are cool together
customer_reviews.author: william sulaski

customer_reviews.title: Minor size and color problems
customer_reviews.text: Narrower than expected, and not at all navy blue - much lighter. Other than that, OK.
customer_reviews.author: gkoutnik

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had worn Sperry Topsidersvfor years and lives these lightweight ones. Fit is great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Larsen

customer_reviews.title: True fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Very attractive foot wear with true boat shoe tread. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Run very large to size
customer_reviews.text: Order at least 1 size to 2 sizes down. These shoes run very large!
customer_reviews.author: Vettel

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this type of shoe from Sperry and I have never been disappointed. These shoes are comfortable and just the right fit. Appear to wear as well as my last pair that I had for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Loves his grandkis

customer_reviews.title: They fit great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Arrived fast and fit like a dream super comfortable and they look great too, I plan on wearing them without socks. I worry that the insoles May get stinky from no socks but you can’t beat the price so I’ll get another pair if it gets too smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m wearing them right now! Comfortable, great fit, and I love em!
customer_reviews.author: Patti C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fit great. Always a great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Emmyfaye

customer_reviews.title: Great looks but not at all comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. But not comfortable wearing them. The back of the shoe rubs with the skin and causes inflammation. It would have been great if they added a soft clothing at the back of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Nithin V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! Just as described! I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Great for lounging by the lake or on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Boat Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband...he loved them! Fit perfectly and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmamutti

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fit and comfort of these casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pam125

customer_reviews.title: My white boat shoes bra’h
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I get a little obsessive about trying not to get them dirty.....
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Grace

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. He even mentioned how much support they have. They look very stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R

customer_reviews.title: Fits right but defiantly will hurt
customer_reviews.text: Looks and size is on point but for boat shoes they are terrible on your feet with no socks. Rug burns galore
customer_reviews.author: sam sweis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new pair os casual summer shoes, and these boat shoes are perfect. Very comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handsome shoes. Just a tad bit large & floppy but laces can be adjust to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn F.

product_meta.title: Men's Sperry, Bahama II Boat Shoe
product_meta.description: The Sperry Top-Sider Men's Bahama Two-Eyelet Boat Shoe has a vulcanized construction, creating a secure bond between Upper and Outsole. The shoe’s genuine hand-sewn Tru-Moc construction and Sperry 360° Lacing System™ with Rust Proof Eyelets create a secure fit around your feet. Additionally, this rubber sole shoe has non-marking rubber outsole with Razor Cut Wave-Siping™ for Ultimate Dry / Wet Traction.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Removable full-length molded PU footbed for all day comfort
361 degree lacing system with rustproof eyelets for a secure, comfortable fit
Lightweight, flexible vulcanized construction with secure bonding between upper and outsole
Non-marking rubber outsoles with molded Wave-Siping for superior wet/dry traction
